class.name: EditorFileSystemImportFormatSupportQueryUSD
class.brief_description: Handles USD file format detection and Blender path configuration for USD import.
class.description: Detects USD files ([code].usd[/code], [code].usda[/code], [code].usdc[/code], [code].usdz[/code]) in the project. USDZ support requires Blender 3.5 or higher. When USD files are detected in the project but Blender is not configured, this class prompts the user to set the Blender path via a configuration dialog. The configured path is stored in [member EditorSettings.filesystem/import/blender/blender_path].
